description:
Bring on the mountains! Whether hut-to-hut treks or day hikes, the Tatra II is a versatile boot that is a pleasure to hike in. Comfort is the name of the game. Its highlights include the supportive Vibram® high-traction sole, comfortable footbed, intelligent lacing and soft, padded cuff. And the leather lining ensures a pleasant wear climate.

*** All Hanwag boots are sold under UK sizing - Please see size chart for details/conversion.
name: HanWag Tatra II - Mens
